item.description:
Vol. 3 Pecha Kucha Night Worcester

Sunday, January 24, 2010
Time: 7:20pm - 10:20pm
Location: Worcester Art Museum
Street: 55 Salisbury Street
City/Town: Worcester, MA

20x20
20 slides 20 seconds
The Pecha Kucha format has spread globally, and is hosted in over 250 cities worldwide.
Come see what all the chit-chat is about and listen to rapid presentations given by creative and passionate people in your community. Devised and shared by Klein Dytham architecture
Music and Light show provided by DJ Karleboy http://www.djkarleboy...

Worcester PKN Vol.3 Jan 24th in the Lancaster Lobby and Caf√© at the Worcester Art Museum

Door: Free and opens at 7:20 for mingling, drinks, and music
Presentations begin at 8:20

For more info visit:
http://www.pecha-kuch...
http://pechakucha-wor...

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Vol. 3 Pecha Kucha Night Worcester: Creative Sharing at the WAM
